**Government Tender Announcement**

### Notification Title
Current and Long-term Analysis of Precious Metals Markets

### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
* Reference Number: CB-539-15582652
* Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000074992

### Procurement Details

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites tenders for the provision of advanced analysis and research services for the precious metals markets, including gold, silver, platinum group metals (PGMs), and other precious metals. The selected contractor will provide detailed and accurate information to inform policy decisions, including:

* Conducting thorough, data-driven research and sound economic analysis of the precious metals markets
* Producing datasets, reports, briefing notes, presentations, and other materials to support policy decisions
* Providing user support for questions about the data, web-based platform, and online tools

### Background and Requirements

The selected contractor will have expertise in the following areas:

* Advanced market analysis and research
* Economic analysis and forecasting
* Database management and analysis
* Data visualization and reporting

The contractor will work closely with NRCan to provide the required information and support within three (3) business days of receiving a request.

### Notice Details

* Tender Closing Date: October 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 4, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: February 3, 2025

### Contact Information

* Name: Jinping Wei
* Email: Jinping.Wei@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 541-7931
* Address: Natural Resources Canada, 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada

### Attachments

A PDF document containing the complete tender package can be downloaded from the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21884/acan-178533.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21884/acan-178533.pdf) ](http://```

### Important Notes

* The tender is expirted, and no further updates will be provided.
* NIBs and Trade Agreements are not applicable.
* All tender-related inquiries should be directed to the contact information provided above.```
